shorts.title: Road closed, police investigation underway in Scranton's west side
shorts.title_distilled: Road closed, police investigation underway in Scranton's west side.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A Scranton roadway was closed, and an investigation is underway after a reported incident on Monday afternoon. Police were seen on the 1100 block of Round Wood Place in Scranton's West Side responding to a reported incident. The nature of the incident is unknown at this time. 28/22 News was [...]

shorts.title: 3 pets dead, 4 people forced out of home after fire
shorts.title_distilled: 3 pets dead, 4 people forced out of home after fire.
shorts.description: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A fire in Moosic forced four people from their home and claimed the lives of three animals. The fire sparked sometime just before 3:00 p.m. at the Moosic Heights trailer park along Moosic Street. Officials on scene told 28/22 News no one was home at the time the fire started. [...]
shorts.content: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A fire in Moosic forced four people from their home and claimed the lives of three animals. The fire sparked sometime just before 3:00 p.m. at the Moosic Heights trailer park along Moosic Street. Officials on scene told 28/22 News no one was home at the time the fire started. [...]
shorts.content_distilled: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — A fire in Moosic forced four people from their home and claimed the lives of three animals.
